title: draft mode norms please
body: I honestly think we should have this why don't we ?

replies.body:
we already have a draft mode.
we don't have dominion though.
remove teambuilder implement draft queue kthxbai.

You four must be new. We had normal draft once but it was removed and replaced with team builder. The reason being that 1) they wanted more people to use TB, 2) ranked draft was cutting into the normal draft queue resulting in long queue times and 3) people who were toxic in ranked and got ranked bans just moved to normal draft.

Agreed, Norms where you can have two of a champ is horrible. 

Id get rid blind pick norms over draft lol.
Very good for practice dat for sure we should have this
Yeah it's strange that we don't... It's good practice for ranked too
